title: Burundi at the 2008 Summer Paralympics
text:
<a href="Burundi">Burundi</a> sent a delegation to compete at the <a href="2008%20Summer%20Paralympics">2008 Summer Paralympics</a> in <a href="Beijing">Beijing</a>, <a href="People%27s%20Republic%20of%20China">People's Republic of China</a>. It was Burundi's first ever participation in the <a href="Paralympic%20Games">Paralympic Games</a>. According to official records, the following three athletes competed in the games:
Athletics.
3 competitors:
